mapper.select: /* getCivilVocieById */ WITH civil_voice AS ( SELECT civil_voice_id, user_id, title, content as contents, location as geometry, heit as altitude, use_yn as available, user_ip as client_ip, view_count, comment_count, year, month, day, year_week, week, hour, minute, update_dt as update_date, regist_dt as insert_date, sido_cd, sgg_cd, emd_cd FROM tn_civil_voice ) SELECT civil_voice.*, ST_X(geometry) AS longitude, ST_Y(geometry) AS latitude, ST_AsText(geometry) AS location, CASE WHEN user_id = #{userId} THEN true ELSE false END as editable FROM civil_voice WHERE civil_voice_id = #{civilVoiceId}
mapper.update:
/* updateCivilVoice */ UPDATE tn_civil_voice SET
title = #{title},
content = #{contents},
location = ST_GeomFromText(#{location}, 4326),
heit = #{altitude},
use_yn = #{available},
user_ip = #{clientIp},
view_count = #{viewCount},
year = #{year},
month = #{month},
day = #{day},
year_week = #{yearWeek},
week = #{week},
hour = #{hour},
minute = #{minute},
sido_cd = #{sidoCd},
sgg_cd = #{sggCd},
emd_cd = #{emdCd},
update_dt = NOW() WHERE civil_voice_id = #{civilVoiceId}
mapper.delete: /* deleteCivilVoice */ DELETE FROM tn_civil_voice WHERE civil_voice_id = #{civilVoiceId}
